website_summaries.verdict: The perfect option for a simple spot to hang your coat when you enter the home. Provides more hooks than other similar products.
pros: Hooks are properly secured right to the wooden base so coats won’t fall off under their own weight
cons: Hooks lack adequate spacing to hold a number of large coats at once

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Love the colors. The wood is a darker finish and the metal hooks are a dark oil rubbed finish? It matches all the other hooks and hangers we got for our bathroom so that's a plus! Very easy to assemble. Comes with all the hardware you need. It did not come with dry wall anchors. So you may need those if you plan on hanging heavy stuff on it. I didn't find any need for them though. Comes with the screw holes already drilled and ready. Also comes with covers for those holes if you don't want the silver screws to be seen. So that was a nice touch that I wasn't expecting. Very satisfied with this buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ella Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: I needed something my children could hang their coats on, since they are not quite tall enough to hang them in the coat closet themselves. This fits the bill perfectly. It's very sturdy since it has 3 spots where you screw it directly onto the wall. The covers for the screws are brown plastic, I thought they'd be the same material and color as the hanger, but it doesn't bother me and looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: For Light Weight Only
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for light weight use, and it fills the bill. Only complaints are the predrilled mounting holes are not spaced for USA building codes i.e. 16 inches apart. If you want to attach into studs you have to drill new holes. I put one drywall screw in the center hole, and into a stud. Then used the rack as a template to mount the drywall molly fasteners, which are not supplied, and secured it to the wall. One drywall screw will hold the 35lb rating they give in the description.
customer_reviews.author: pepenikos

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Been looking everywhere to find one that would fit my size of area. This six scroll is perfect. I absolutely love the look and color. I recommend this to anyone and everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Clears Clutter
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these racks and hung them side by side across one entire wall next to my husband's side of bed. They are so awesome. I saw a project on Pinterest and was going to do but when I was researching I found these and they are so much more cost effective and look so nice, I am so happy I decided on these instead. We bought two so we would have 12 hooks all the way across wall. We did have to trim ends on both and they fit as snug as if they were custom made. I am buying more for each room now. Love them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: grannylinda

customer_reviews.title: I'm All Hooked Up!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these hook racks and mounted them side by side to cover a larger distance. My honey loves to hang his coats and sock hats at the kitchen door, so I mounted the racks on the wall behind the door. They look great! Well, there's so much stuff hanging on them you can't see them, but believe me when they're not loaded with stuff they look great! The wood is good quality and the hooks are nice and solid and right now I'm looking for more places in my house to mount more. Definitely need some in my honey's bathroom. See y'all, gotta order more of these. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Sheree Keneson

customer_reviews.title: Good product, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: The Liberty hardware six hook coat hanger is sturdy and solid. Its color is exactly as pictured on amazon. The metal hooks are firm and secure on the solid wood. I use it for the kids bathroom for them to hang their towels on and it works for this purpose and holds up with six big towels hanging on it. Installation was quite easy. If you dont have studs where the 3 holes are, just use anchors to keep it in place, as we did, and it holds it in place just fine. Overall it is a good solid product and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: asmith6kids

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: It's ok for the cost. The screw holes are not 16 inches apart so you can't mount it into studs. My husband thought tht was a big deal but I didn't want to put the effort into the remedies he suggested... It also didn't come with drywall anchors- just screws. So it doesn't seem like the sturdiest as is. Will update if it falls off the wall. I'm surprised this had a 4.5 star average rating...
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect budget wall hook
customer_reviews.text: This is the best budget wall hook you can find on Amazon. Easy to install, sturdy and durable, and looks way more expensive than it is. Holds me and my roommates multiple coats and scarves for the winter. For install you do need a screwdriver, but the screws they provided were perfect for the hooks. They even provide covers for the screws so it looks amazing all over. 10/10 would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: K. L.

customer_reviews.title: A good rack
customer_reviews.text: Once it's installed it looks nice. The hooks have a bit too much of a curve, which means that clothes often get caught on the hook instead of coming right off--not a big deal. Installing it was weird, most items like this put their mounting holes 16 inches apart to line up with wall studs, this did not.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bascom

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous hook rack
customer_reviews.text: I used this in an office space. It was the perfect length for a small group of people. You wouldn't be able to have more than 2-3 people using this at a time. The construction is very sturdy and it was well built. The materials feel very strong and I am hoping that they will last a while. It came with all the mounting hardware that was needed and it even has some small plugs to hide the screws. So far it is working out well and should be holding my coats for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Gingerbread

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: this is exactly what I was looking for to hang behind our bedroom door for robes, jackets and clothes not ready for the laundry yet. The only suggestion I would have is to put two of the mounting holes at 16 inches on center rather than 3 evenly spaced mounting holes. Looks good and it works, we just had to use a molly to secure it to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Chief

customer_reviews.title: Like it. Pretty & Functional
customer_reviews.text: I really like this coat rack. We hang it low so each of our three kids can access their coats (or help younger siblings). While I wish the holes were spaced to fit studs, my hubby doesn't see a problem with the weight it will bear. We also have preschool backpacks hanging from it too.
customer_reviews.author: Mamma Manda

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking unit and fairly priced.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking unit that seems sturdy and lasting. The only thing is the pre drilled holes are not on 16 inch centers so you have to find one stud and use one pre-drilled hole..and then move 16 inches away and drill your own second hole to make sure this thing is solidly anchored to hold heavy coats.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Brown

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how I'd feel after reading that the little knobs that house the screws are plastic, but I don't think I'd know if I hadn't been the one to hang it. They color match perfectly. It attaches with 3 screws, and even not being screwed into studs, it feels very secure. I love that there are so many hooks. Typically I'm hanging jackets on every other hook, but when company comes, I easily have 2-3 hooks to use. It also just looks well made and classy on my wall. Better than the ones I saw at Home Depot, and costs less too.
customer_reviews.author: Becz

customer_reviews.title: Good, but could have been great
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good, very nice coat rack. It has 3 holes to attach to the wall, and they are spaced 13" apart. Had the holes been 16" apart, could have easily hit 2 wall studs and not needed to use drywall anchors (which are not included).
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: I liked this so much
customer_reviews.text: I liked this so much, I've bought 2 of them in the past 2 years. Pros: Well made Color is true to the pictures Quite sturdy. Cons: The hole placement is weird. There are 3 holes and at best you will be able to sink one of them into a stud. The other 2 will require wall anchors which are included. I don't know about you but for some reason there are always 20+ coats/jackets/hoodies on the pegs so this was important.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Hooks are not sturdy and break
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and looks of this Hook Rack but two of the hooks have broken. The top hook portion snapped off both times. Once from a heavy coat, and another time from the dog tugging on something hanging from the hook. The hooks are not metal. "Soft iron" describes only the color, not the material. The broken surfaces look almost like ceramic. Would not buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Pandion

customer_reviews.title: Classic piece
customer_reviews.text: Nice little piece. This just came with 3 standard wood screws, and of course the holes aren't spaced for standard studs, so I decided to use wall anchors. Looking at the hooks, the wife should be able to hang anything she wants off it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: These hooks are really nice quality and they look good I hung two one for coats and the one below it for hats and scarves. Like them so much I ordered another two for the bedroom. Totally impressed by the packaging they were securely wrapped in an individual box and then inside another box.
customer_reviews.author: Miyamom

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this item 4, yes 4 times, in attempt to get a good product. As you can see in the picture, it is made of compressed wood/particle board, and for some reason at least one end arrives with this chewed up look. I never recieved the third order and so I was rush delivered this last one. I was hopeful, as unlike the first row packages, this one was very well packaged, but alas, when I opened this forth one, the end is chewed
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Y. Sibert

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was a foot longer but is working great for us
customer_reviews.text: Nothing exciting but exactly as described. Wish it was a foot longer but is working great for us. Have it in the utility room opposite wall of the show bench i bought at the same time. It's a 5 if you take in cheap price. The holes predrilled didn't match my studs but I have a stud finder so drilled another hole. We are using it no complaints but don't expect to put 5 adult size winter jackets on it. Lay your jackets down and take measurement of length.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Marleau

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you really can't beat this. It was extremely easy to install and if you don't want to screw into the wall, 2-3 double sided sticky adhesive strips can hold it up just fine along with coat or jacket weight. The wood and quality of the metal racks is holding up well even after 4-6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Erik T

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but no drywall screws.
customer_reviews.text: So this product is nice. However, there are no drywall anchors included with the hardware. Why this is a problem: Each of the holes for screws are at 12 and 5/8" apart. So when lining up with studs is impossible if your home is properly constructed with 16" on center studs. Why would you send any hardware?, if your not including drywall anchors?
customer_reviews.author: Gunter

customer_reviews.title: So So quality.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's decent, but the Finish chips very easily. Installing the screw caps chipped a piece of paint. It was obvious the paint around the screw opening was never bonded well to the board. The other aspects of it seem to be pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: dwdw3

customer_reviews.title: Goor for what it is
customer_reviews.text: A little bit of a pain to intall but hold up nice. Didn't come with any mounting hardware but I managed to get it onto some studs and used heavy duty drywall anchors where it needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey O

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing never had a coat rack before and not sure why i waited so long! Its sturdy was easy to put up and we use it everyday. We made sure to use proper drywall anchor screws to be able to handle weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ary Cinder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We had a set of hooks in our front hall, but needed way more for winter. I bought 2 of these one for each side of the current rack. They look great. It was mentioned that the mounting holes aren't standard stud-width. I matched up 1 of the holes with a stud and used drywall toggles for the other 2 screws on each one.
customer_reviews.author: Datasafety

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Beautiful color.
customer_reviews.text: I own two. I ordered one about a year ago and have hanged backpacks coats keys etc. I decided to change it and put it on my kids restroom for their towels to dry. Keeps the bathroom cleaner so I ordered a second one for the master bedroom last week. It’s very sturdy and well made. You won’t regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Elegant scroll hooks, sturdy, well made, very good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice! Sturdy easy to hang. I used a fairly heavy duty wall anchor. The little rubber caps included to hide the screw holes are a bit hard and not easy to insert into the holes. I used a pair of pliers and "massaged" them until they were more pliable and they went in the holes better. I would definitely order this rack again.
customer_reviews.author: JuJuBeeb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install, Classic Look
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to mount and looks great on the wall. Our old tripod coat rack broke, and we wanted something to replace it that wasn't expensive and didn't take up much space on our stairwell landing. We mounted this on the wall right at the bottom of our stairs (near the front door) and it's absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: greenbrier

customer_reviews.title: Looks well-made
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it is made of solid materials and the hooks are attached well. I hung it with drywall mounts anywhere it wasn't attached to a stud. The wood was slightly warped (the wood warped out toward me, away from the wall). I had to push on the ends to warp it back toward the wall during mounting.
customer_reviews.author: emerald_ibis

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for two years and I love it. Super sturdy and great quality. Took about 30 minutes to install and only because I’m super ocd with lining things up on the wall
customer_reviews.author: Treesallaround

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to hang in our entry way for purses, bags, umbrellas, jackets, etc. It works great! It was super easy to install too. It has 6 hooks and feels like its durable with a thick piece of wood. Ours has been up a few weeks now and it's still holding all our stuff perfectly! I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and sturdy. Must have your own anchors
customer_reviews.text: The rack looks nice and looks sturdy however I'm disappointed they it didn't come with drywall anchors. The kit only includes 3 wood screws. Not one to use on drywall.
customer_reviews.author: jduval

customer_reviews.title: Works well, looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought was delivered broken. One of the hooks was broken in half. Amazon took that one back and shipped me a new one. It works for exactly what I wanted it to. And looks very nice in my entry way. I'm just a little nervous using it to hold anything heavy knowing that the hooks do break off. Otherwise I'd give it 5 stars. Use only for light coats and bags.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Grice

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again, suspect quality
customer_reviews.text: Pressboard, not solid wood. Mounting hikes are not 16" on center, so you can only hit one stud. They do not provide molly bombshell for the other two holes, which is poor design. I can't for the life of me figure out if the hooks are real metal or just really good fakes. I did put it up and it looks ok from a distance. Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.author: William W

customer_reviews.title: Went up easily and look great!
customer_reviews.text: This product was just as described. It was the perfect color and went up on the wall easily (other users were correct about the centering so we just made sure that the center screw went solidly into a stud and used drywall anchors for the two outer screws). The only problem we had was getting the plastic screw covers inserted...they did NOT want to fit...so we used a BGH and they finally went in. Loving my new scarf rack!
customer_reviews.author: PLee

customer_reviews.title: Mounting holes are 10" apart
customer_reviews.text: It does the job it was intended to do, but I expected the mounting holes to be 16" apart. They were not. They were around 10" apart. I did not use the mounting holes, but instead left the screw heads exposed and screwed the hook rack to studs 16" apart.
customer_reviews.author: Dressingthefamily

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! There’s not a lot of closet space in my apartment this works super well to hold all my jackets and cardigans
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Ababon

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and well crafted.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, looks nice, hangs jackets, backpacks and heavy stuff. I put this in the hallway outside the daughters room with a couple wall reinforcement inserts. So far it hangs all her "stuff" and then some. I'd recommend it. Looks nice and functions well
customer_reviews.author: P. Green

customer_reviews.title: Solid build quality
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the sturdiness of the product. Everything fit perfectly, has no problem holding an entire family's set of winter coats and bags and scarves and dog leashes. Feels like I could do pull-ups on it, not that I plan to try.
customer_reviews.author: Asp

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. It came with everything we needed. We have two. One with jackets and bags for my wife and I. Another with the kids school bags and jackets.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: It's SUPER easy to install! We hung a lot of heavy things on it from kids pack packs from school with books in them to baseball bags that had cleats, baseball bat, helmet, gloves. Very DURABLE!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bellemore

customer_reviews.title: decent for price
customer_reviews.text: For the money. Cant beat it. Looks nice. But it's pressboard and not real wood. Hooks feel like they could snap easily if tugged on hard. But gets job done and looks nice. If you want real wood or tougher hooks. Spend more money
customer_reviews.author: Customer Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Took maybe 40 seconds to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy install, not too terribly expensive, and a nice dark wood color. If only everything I bought off Amazon was like this.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Great value and tough
customer_reviews.text: This thing is tough. Not solid wood, but good quality particle board. Mounted to a stud and I feel like I can hang an elephant on it. Hooks are good quality and solidly mounted to the plank. Took 5 minutes to install and looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: N8A1

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: One of the many that I have bought. I have a bought a few of these they work very good.
customer_reviews.author: Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: I just opened my package and its damaged and I'm very disappointed and now have to pay to return item I've never heard anything like this. The package was fine but this was obviously damaged and then packaged
customer_reviews.author: Stacy braatz

customer_reviews.title: I'm hooked on this Six Scroll rack!
customer_reviews.text: I admit, I was nervous about what was going to show up at my door when I ordered this Six Scroll Hook Rack. I thought it might be cheaply made and not suitable for my front hall. However, it's really quite beautiful! It's a very sturdy, well-made product and it's so much nicer than I anticipated! What you see in the photo is exactly what you'll receive. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MyssKitty

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The product was a great one, it just did not match the shoe bench that it was paired up with. The color was way off so I returned.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: The pocket wholes for the screws are very small, I drilled them out a bit to use better screws. Nice and strong! I have eight coats hanging on mine right now.
customer_reviews.author: Eric rodriquez

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted this for our basement to hang leashes and coats for our dog walks. This looks very nice and has held up to a lot of items being thrown on it (some with some weight to them, like our canvas bag with a bunch of toys, food and water dishes, etc.). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Upwardly mobile single

customer_reviews.title: Solid coat rack
customer_reviews.text: The coat rack looks great and is made very solid. We have a heavy winter coat on almost every hook and haven't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Schraufnagel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my family room after reading others reviews. Love it. Works great, very sturdy and easy to install!
customer_reviews.author: Christina B.

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our office when we moved into a new office space. While we are still in the process of getting things up on the walls, this gives a nice clean modern look. I should also mention that it works well and its sturdy, as I suppose usability matters too..
customer_reviews.author: Andy G.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking coat rack
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Great looking coat rack. Strong and holds a lot of coats. CONS: If you hand up your coats with a collar loop (or whatever they're called), the hooks will often snag on them. A minor concern of course, but if you're not careful, I could see you ripping off your loops. Better to just hang your coats by the collar IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Bad

customer_reviews.title: Good but just a note
customer_reviews.text: Note: This is not 16 on center which I did not notice before purchasing. I ended up changing plans and mounting to the back of my door which looks great. Previous reviews state that the hooks may not be solid due to the nature they are mounted into the pressed-wood. This is not true. If you are hanging coats and shirts then this is just fine and solid. If you are hanging bowling balls, then it may be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Peter J Bill

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like them using staples on the back for a tag. Was hard to take off.
customer_reviews.text: Otherwise it is sturdy and well made and just right for my needs. Gave it 4 stars because of them defacing the product with heavy duty staples.
customer_reviews.author: CDBear

customer_reviews.title: No more jackets on your chairs!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for entrance areas that don't have enough room for a closet. I hang either 2 light jackets or 1 heavy jacket per handle. Me and my guests no longer need to wrap our jackets around the closest chair we find from the entrance! Definitely makes the room look neater
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Seems nice and sturdy, I'll update if for some reason it doesn't hold up my stuff but better quality than the one I had previously for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful and sturdy. More rustic looking than I would have thought but I still love them. The look great. I also bought the 3 hook version of this to hang lower for the kids. Installs very easily!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking, Easy to Install- No Drywall Anchors
customer_reviews.text: Just put this up, looks great and easy Installation. As someone else mentioned, there are no drywall anchors. Not worth knocking a star off but it would be nice if they included them. Only pennies of cost but a pain if you don't have some laying around. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: This coat rack is made of great material and quality
customer_reviews.text: This coat rack is made of great material and quality. It can hold quite a lot of coats and other things. My kids tend to put their book bags, hats, coats, and sometimes towels on it and it holds it all. It doesn't come with any wall anchors, and if you don't use any it may not work as well. We had some so we used them and its rather sturdy. It was a nice addition to our foyer area.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Durable hooks, great for coats
customer_reviews.text: We use this for my kids' jackets and backpacks. It's held up beautifully and looks great! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Tsutsuji

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the quality of this rack. Use it in my kids bathroom to hold their individual bath towels. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Velvet

customer_reviews.title: Very nice item for holding my hats and keys
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for holding all of my rack hats and for holding my keys for all my cars. Nice looking and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: S. Spinner

customer_reviews.title: Long and strong
customer_reviews.text: I just received my package in the mail yesterday at work and I couldn't wait to take it home and put it up. The only problem with this product I had is that it wasn't as long as I was hoping it would be, but its okay, it works for what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: MoFel

customer_reviews.title: Useful thing
customer_reviews.text: Really useful thing which everyone needs in the apartment. So nice and perfect.
customer_reviews.author: mamimami

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coat hanger
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Awesome coat hanger, super easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and great look to it
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and great look to it. Does an amazing job, we have like five coats hanging for it and it holds up great. Also holds me heavy purse with no problems. Super easy to hang, it was a little hard getting the caps in to cover the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Olafson

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Overall nice piece but would be nice if the pre drilled spots were aligned with a stud measurment or if it came with sheetrock achors. Overall would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Adam & Maralyn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Coat Rack
customer_reviews.text: I put two of these right next to each other to create the illusion of one long coat rack. It looks great in my entryway! The screw holes didn't line up with the studs in our desired location so we did use drywall anchors. It still seems nice and sturdy but I'll probably be cautious of how much I hang. I just hope it entices us to stay more organized ;)
customer_reviews.author: Krysteen Dee

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. Box damaged.
customer_reviews.text: It had some small paint chips on two corners. I fixed them with some acrylic paint I have. A marker would have worked also. The packaging needs to be improved a bit. The box I got was flimsy cardboard. Otherwise, great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Long

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead get one; it's worth it.
customer_reviews.text: What you see is what you get. Mounted properly ( good drywall anchors and at least one screw in a stud) it will do just fine. It holds all of my fall & winter coats jackets hoodies scarves etc. Which add up to about 25 or 30 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: BillyRussell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: We needed extra hooks for a closet and this product was great! It was as described and it has held many heavy coats and has held up with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Fahy

customer_reviews.title: Made it easy to organize a messy entrance area!
customer_reviews.text: This rack is VERY attractive, was easy to hang and easily holds 6 or more jackets or sweatshirts. Cleared up a stack of outerwear that ended up on a nearby chair whenever we came home. It WAS lighter than I expected ... but seems extremely sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Patty L

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome coat rack! Holds all our heavy winter coats with no problem. Just made sure to put the middle of the coatrack into a stud to keep it sturdy and then anchored the other 2
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works... Well
customer_reviews.text: I live in a house of six and we desperately needed a coat rack for all of our coats that end up all over the place. This was one of the few racks that matched what I was looking for. Is quite sturdy, nice looking, and we actually can hang multiple coat up on it without fear of it falling off the wall. I am very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sly Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Great coat rack!
customer_reviews.text: This is a sold coat rack. The screw holes are well concealed and it holds coats for the whole family. Looks great with my decor and feels like a quality piece.
customer_reviews.author: JLSinSEA

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It's nice looking and suits me fine, though I wish it came with wall anchors like most things of this nature. Kind of hard to expect studs to magically be where you need them....
customer_reviews.author: groovebilledani

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: My husband had to rig it to install it. Something about the distance between the screws not being normal but we have it hanging with one screw and it’s holding all of over backpacks without budging great way to get the clutter off the floor
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Place to Hang Out
customer_reviews.text: Still love them. We use these in the hall to hang up everything 😆
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hanger!
customer_reviews.text: The hanger was easy to install. It’s big enough and I’m enjoying it. Make sure to use heavy duty dry wall anchors.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Dimitrova

customer_reviews.title: It's nice looking, but also inconspicuous so it's not the ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for next to our front door. It's nice looking, but also inconspicuous so it's not the focal point of our living room. The double hooks help keep all of our clutter (coats, hats, bags) off the floor. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: L Russell

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very nice item sturdy and looks good. It got 4 stars because they stapled the hardware to the back of it and it was a pain to get out
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Well-made & Attractive
customer_reviews.text: This hook rack is sturdy & will easily support your items if properly installed. Generous space between the hooks accommodates your bulky coats.
customer_reviews.author: Wheeze

customer_reviews.title: Great Find and Investment!
customer_reviews.text: We ve been hanging all our winter and rain gear on this rack in the laundry room for 4 people in the family and guests and, after 1 year, it's as solid, strong and classy looking as when we got it!
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job if It Doesn’t Nee d to Look Too Good
customer_reviews.text: It’s sturdy and looks pretty good but it’s not real wood. I ended up putting it in a linen closet where peoe dont really see it. It serves its purpose.... just could be nicer quality.
customer_reviews.author: J-Mo

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this coat rack
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this coat rack. It looks great and holds up fine with several coats on it. My only complaint is that the screw holes are not in the right place to actually hit studs. I was only able to grab a stud with the center hole and had to use wall anchors for the other screws.
customer_reviews.author: RachelS

customer_reviews.title: Not as heavy duty as I was expecting but so ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as heavy duty as I was expecting but so far we've not had any problems. I mounted it with anchors and we hang our winter coats on it and it is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Diana D.

customer_reviews.title: and my entry way has never looked better!
customer_reviews.text: Put this on the wall above this: Winsome Dayton Storage Hall Bench with Shelves, and my entry way has never looked better!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great looking coat rack.
customer_reviews.text: My son has a small closet and he is getting bigger with bigger jackets and such so this is so nice looking to put on the wall in his room.
customer_reviews.author: Bozenka

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected. Nice product, quality. Easy to install. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, air it out first to get rid of the "stain" smell
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well, but boy did it stink (smell bad) when it first arrived. They must stain these on the fly because ours came smelling of fresh stain. I had to air it out for a few days first.
customer_reviews.author: Abed H.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy hangar
customer_reviews.text: Expertly crafted, I love the finish and the hooks are solid and also pretty. It also comes with knobs to fill in the screw holes which adds a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Pelthail

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Was very happy with how it turned out and easy for me to do it by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Krstehlik

customer_reviews.title: One of the better looking hook racks
customer_reviews.text: One of the better looking hook racks, went up easily. My only complaint is the tabs that hide the screws would not fit in the holes. I ended up just leaving them off though and it doesn't look any worse with the exposed screw heads
customer_reviews.author: CayoT

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the quality of the coat rack
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the quality of the coat rack, very sturdy and attractive. We choose to use longer screws to make sure it can hold the weight of many coats at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Creed

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We had a small shelf with two hooks on it for the entry way but I really like this one. Easy to put up and i love the darker color and the color of the hooks. I bought two and now I just need to think of where to put the other one. Now, if i can only get my kids to hang their jackets up!
customer_reviews.author: Krista

product_meta.title: 165541 Coat Rack, 27-Inch, Wall Mounted Coat Rack with 6 Decorative Hooks, Soft Iron and Cocoa
product_meta.description:
Size:27-Inch| Color:Soft Iron and CocoaMake home organization and storage a priority but do with style. Easily create additional storage in your home, at a great value, with this wall mounted coat rack. With 6 decorative hooks, this coat rack allows for increased holding capacity of your most important items like coats, hats, umbrellas, handbags and more. The cocoa wood finish and the soft iron scroll hooks will compliment most home decors. Install this wall mounted coat rack in the foyer, hallway, bedroom, kitchen or mudroom to easily create organization and storage in your home.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From Liberty Hardware, the 27" Rail with 6 Scroll Hooks is one of our most popular combinations. The cocoa wood finish and soft iron hooks will compliment most home decors. The six scroll hooks are reminiscent of iron work.
feature_bullets: ORGANIZATION AND STORAGE: Great for storage of backpacks, coats, hats, umbrellas, towels, and more
PLACEMENT: Adds stylish organization to your foyer, bedrooms, bathrooms, hallways and more
WEIGHT CAPACITY: Holds up to 35 lbs. when coat rack is wall mounted into solid wood or wood studs
PRODUCT FINISH: 6 soft iron coat and hat hooks with a cocoa, high quality medium density fiberboard (MDF) base
DIMENSIONS: 27-inch hook rack base measuring 3 inches in height. Each single hook projects 2-7/16 inches from the wall with total hook height of 4-1/8 inches
INSTALLATION: Includes mounting hardware and installation instructions for your convenience
